verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Flowing, flowing, flowing into God
Flowing, flowing, flowing into God
It takes a breaking, it takes a melting.
It takes a breaking, it takes a melting.
It takes a breaking, it takes a melting.
Flowing into God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Growing into Christ, etc.
Seeing, Yielding, etc.
Going on to Zion, etc.
Willing, Walking, etc.
